name: Laser X Ray Pointer Prank
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true X-Ray.
Laser Pointer Prank X rays - a game application is a joke created for entertainment and fun of your friends and family with the help of an X-ray laser pointer!
Body scans of people with the help of a laser pointer and see X-rays! Play a joke on a friend, scan his body! It's fun!
How to play:
1. Read the instructions, including the application will automatically connect the camera.
2. Move to a friend or any other person and press Start Scan.
3. After scanning X-ray image appears!
4. Show a friend and play it!
ATTENTION! The game was created for fun and entertainment, it does not bear any harm and is designed only for the draw! X-ray carries no radiation is a false phenomenon!
Download free fun joke now and become popular among friends!
Thank you for playing with us, leave us your feedback and we will do our game even better for you!
